summary: HEAD LIGHTS ARE SO BAD IT'S DANGEROUS DRIVING AT NIGHT WITH THE LOW BEAMS. THE INTERNAL HEAD LIGHT SHUTTER CREATES A DISTINCT LINE WITH TOTAL DARKNESS ABOVE. WHILE TAKING A TURN YOU HAVE NO LIGHT TO THE SIDE AT ALL! YOU EASILY OUT DRIVE THE HEAD LIGHTS WITH ONLY THE LOW BEAM. BEEN IN THE DEALER SEVERAL TIMES. THIS IS A DESIGN FLAW. NO GOOD AFTER MARKET FIX!
